description: Tammy Abraham scores for AC Milan but Inter strike back to ensure the first leg of their Coppa Italia semi-final ends in a draw.
title: AC Milan 1-1 Inter Milan: Coppa Italia derby semi-final level after first leg
title_page: AC Milan 1-1 Inter Milan: Coppa Italia derby semi-final level after first leg - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Hakan Çalhanoglu (Inter Milan) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Post
Attempt missed. Rafael Leão (AC Milan) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Youssouf Fofana following a fast break.
Post
Attempt missed. Nicolò Barella (Inter Milan) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Hakan Çalhanoglu following a corner.
Post
Attempt saved. Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Inter Milan) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Marcus Thuram.
